title: "Advent of Code 2021 - Day 1"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
dt <- data.table(read.table("input.txt", sep = "\n"))
head(dt)
```

```{r}
# part 1
dt$diff <- c(0, diff(dt$V1))
dt %>%
  filter(diff > 0) %>%
  nrow()
```


```{r}
# part 2
dt$diff <- c(0, 0, 0, diff(dt$V1, lag = 3))
dt %>%
  filter(diff > 0) %>%
  nrow()
```
